issue.title: Python: API documentation via sphinx-apidoc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-97](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-97). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For developers using Arrow via Python, we should provide an automatically generated API documentation via sphinx(-apidoc).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-97?focusedCommentId=15580488) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
